title: For only 48 hours, lifetime access to Microsoft Visual Studio is under $40
content:
Macworld

If you’re a programmer who could use more insights into your code or part of a development team that needs to program more efficiently and accurately, Microsoft Visual Studio Professional 2022 can help. This powerful 64-bit IDE from Microsoft makes complex coding projects easier, and it’s on for only $39.97 (reg. $44.99) for 48 hours.

With Microsoft Visual Studio Pro, you can write in several languages and programs in the same interface, making complicated projects a little more simple. It also supports collaboration with Live Share, which helps teams of programmers ensure their code is consistent and speeds up editing and debugging. Meanwhile, users can benefit from better progress tracking and code insights with CodeLens.

You can even automate your coding with IntelliCode, which can understand your code’s context, like variable name, functions, etc., to help you complete your next line or block of code. If you’re stuck, the system can even provide the next best coding options so your workflow isn’t hindered.

Code more efficiently and accurately with lifetime access to Microsoft Visual Studio Professional 2022 for Windows, now just $39.97 through March 17 at 11:59 PM Pacific.
